pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Add support for sdformat frame semantics

content.raw:
The `lift_drag_system` test is failing:

~~~
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ign-gazebo/test/integration/lift_drag_system.cc:235
Value of: forces.size()
  Actual: 0
Expected: testIters
Which is: 1000
~~~

We can fix it after code freeze.
